content: आश्विन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Belonging or sacred to the Aśvins (अश्विनौ देवते अस्य). {@--2@} Pervading. --नः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a month (in which the moon is near ths constellation Aśvinī). {@--2@} A sacrifice or a weapon presided over by the Aśvins. {@--3@} (<ab>du.</ab>) The Aśvins. --नी {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of certain bricks. {@--2@} A pile, stack (चितिभेदः). --नं A day's journey for a horse or rider (<ab>Ved.</ab>).
